beforeStages.name: Navigate to the New Item Page.

steps.name: Go to the New Item Page by clicking New Item button.
Navigate to "NewItemPage"

beforeStages.name: Prepare a page for copy with an existing item

steps.name: Create new folder: "'Folder_for_copy'"
Go to the main page by clicking logo.
Navigate to "MainPage"
Go to the New Item Page by clicking New Item button.
Navigate to "NewItemPage"
Enter the first character of the item name into the 'Copy from' input field
Wait for the element to be visible
